Who I Am

I love to learn, and my current learning goal is full stack web and mobile development. As time goes on, I plan to create many projects of increasing complexity to put my newfound knowledge to use and eventually secure a job in the field.

I have a varied work career where I started as a flat roofing tradesmen and eventually moved towards construction management and engineering roles. I found that I was progressing along this path, that I really missed the hands on work that I used to get when working in the trades. It is a satisfying feeling to me to not only be designing and problem solving, but also to be building and implementing these solutions myself. This is one of the key factors that made me interested in the software space.

Check out my blog to read about my thoughts and progress along my journey!
